nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: A New Hope (Scholastic)
LEGO Star Wars: A New Hope is a LEGO young readers adaptation of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The book, 24 pages long, was written Ace Landers and was published on December 29, 2015.

The galaxy is in trouble, and it's up to Luke Skywalker and his friends to defeat Darth Vader and the Empire. There's only one thing to do-- blow up the Death Star! Featuring Luke, Leia, Han Solo, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and more!
